user.title: Set up HA text AI
user.description: Configure your OpenAI integration for smart home interactions. You'll need an OpenAI API key to proceed.

api_key.name: OpenAI API Key
api_key.description: Your OpenAI API key from platform.openai.com

model.name: AI Model
model.description: Select the AI model to use. GPT-3.5-Turbo is recommended for most uses.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls response creativity (0-2). Lower values for focused responses, higher for creative ones.

max_tokens.name: Max Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum length of responses. Higher values allow longer responses but use more API tokens.

api_endpoint.name: API Endpoint
api_endpoint.description: OpenAI API endpoint URL. Leave default unless using a custom endpoint.

request_interval.name: Request Interval
request_interval.description: Minimum time between API requests in seconds. Increase if hitting rate limits.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your OpenAI API key and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to API. Please check your internet connection and API endpoint.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
error.already_exists: This API key is already configured in another integration.
error.invalid_model: Selected model is not available. Please choose a different model.
error.rate_limit: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later or increase the request interval.
error.context_length: Input too long for selected model. Try reducing max tokens or using a model with larger context.
error.api_error: OpenAI API error. Please check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This OpenAI integration is already configured
abort.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Please verify your API key.
